name: A View to a Kill
description:
A View to a Kill is the name of two separate computer games released in 1985 and based on the James Bond film A View to a Kill. The first, an action game titled A View to a Kill: The Computer Game, was developed and published by Domark. It was available for the ZX Spectrum, Amstrad CPC, Commodore 64, Oric 1 and Oric Atmos, and MSX.

The second game, titled James Bond 007: A View to a Kill, is a text-based adventure video game for MS-DOS, Macintosh and Apple II computers. It was developed by Angelsoft, Inc. and published by Mindscape.
